summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Teacher's Pet Review Date: 2013/11/06 Categories: Comedy, Romance, Passionate Product Description: ["Clark Gable (in one of his finest late-career performances) plays Jim Gannon, a school-of-hard-knocks newspaperman who despises journalism schools...until he sees who's doing the teaching. Attracted to lovely professor Erica Stone (Day), he masquerades as a novice in her class. Soon he's her prize pupil, all the while trying to make her his own prize."] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['George Seaton'], 'Producers': ['William Perlberg'], 'Starring': ['Clark Gable', 'Doris Day', 'Gig Young']} Review Text: This was an enjoyable movie to watch.
Doris Day and Clark Gable were fantastic in their roles. A good late night movie to enjoy with a bowl of popcorn! Review Title: Enjoyable Movie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/01/04 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Lee Philips'], 'Producers': ['Bob Ross', 'Aaron Ruben', 'Sheldon Leonard', 'Danny Thomas', 'Jay Sandrich', 'Jerry Jameson', 'Richard O. Linke'], 'Starring': ['Andy Griffith', 'Frances Bavier', 'Ron Howard']} Review Text: We've watched every season of the Andy Griffith Show, and loved every one! I wish there was good, wholesome TV shows still on the television like this today. Review Title: Great Show Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/07/13 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Uberto Pasolini'], 'Producers': ['Ceri Hughes', 'Uberto Pasolini', 'Marco Valerio Pugini', 'Christopher Simon', 'Barnaby Southcombe'], 'Starring': ['Eddie Marsan', 'Joane Froggatt'], 'Studio': ['Redwave Films']} Review Text: This movie seemed almost more like a documentary. Very thought provoking. I didn't see the ending coming, but kudos to the writers and actors for pulling this off. Review Title: This movie seemed almost more like a documentary Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/06/25 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['William Asher', 'James V. Kern', 'Marc Daniels', 'Ralph Levy'], 'Producers': ['Desi Arnaz', 'Jess Oppenheimer', 'Al Simon', 'Jack Aldworth', 'Lucille Ball']} Review Text: Love being able to watch television shows that are clean and wholesome. The whole family can watch! Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reflects a strong preference for nostalgic and wholesome entertainment, particularly classic television shows and movies featuring notable actors from earlier decades. The individual consistently rates products highly, indicating a genuine enjoyment of content marked by comedy and romance, and they appreciate engaging storytelling, often favoring lighter themes and family-friendly options. 

Common purchasing patterns include a tendency to favor clean content free from excessive foul language, violence, or adult themes, which speaks to the desire for wholesome viewing experiences that can be shared with the family. Price sensitivity is not explicitly indicated, but repeated purchases indicate a willingness to invest in quality programming that aligns with their values. 

Overall, this individual seeks enjoyable, thought-provoking content with a blend of romance and comedy—favoring performances by iconic actors while preferring shows that evoke nostalgia and provide safe viewing for a mixed audience.

target_interaction.title: Great Action Movie!
target_interaction.text: We love to watch all of the Jason Bourne movies.  They are action packed without all of the sexual scenes included in some of the other action movies of this caliber.  We have watched all of the Bourne movies, and have not been disappointed!
